pullRequest.title: improve correctness for logging config
pullRequest.bodyText:
While digging into the logging configuration I found out that log4j jar is only needed for testing: (Dropwizard is using Logback , Tools are already defining it for runtime)


Dropwizard 2.0.8 is using slf4j 1.7.30 , therefor sl4j-log4j12 should be 1.7.30 as well (as the comment notes)


However, no functionality change is detected:
log4j is still included in the shaded web jar (but I do not understand why)
slf4j works for testing, unchanged, as far as I can see.
I proposing to apply the change regardless for the sake of minimal surprise.

nodes.bodyText: Note that this is the dependencyManagement section. We are already declaring the scope at the places we actually use this dependency, so I think we should leave out the scope here. Actually for sf4j-log4j12 we should do the same?
Its a bit unfortunate the dropwizard BOM does not declare this dependency and there is no way we can access the slf4j.version property from there right?
